text: The Pearl Source is an online shop for cultured pearl jewelry. ==History== The Pearl Source was established in 1991. It is located in the Jewelry District of Los Angeles. Also known as Laguna Pearl. ==See also== * List of jewellery types * Oyster farming * Pearl farming * Pearling in Western Australia ==References== ==External links== * The Pearl Source official website Category:Online jewelry retailers of the United States Category:Wholesalers of the United States Category:American companies established in 1991 Category:Retail companies established in 1991 Category:Internet properties established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in California
title: The Pearl Source
